title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. A, pt. 838 - Public Access To Records And Information (article 8)
content:

§ 838.4 - Preparation of new records

§ 838.9 - Time limitations

§ 838.11 - Waiver of fees
§ 838.12 - Exempt information

§ 838.17 - Disclosure to other Federal government departments and agencies

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. A, pt. 838

Statutory authority: Delaware River Basin Compact, §
14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
